edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.catalog

Class CourseCatalog

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.catalog.CourseCatalog

  • public class CourseCatalog
extends java.lang.Object
    Maintains a catalog of all courses available at NC State as a sorted list of courses. Includes methods to read courses from a file, add and remove courses, and export the catalog.
    Author:
    Michael Lee (mlee25)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CourseCatalog()
      Constructs an empty course catalog.

      Adds a Course to the catalog.
      java.lang.String[][] getCourseCatalog()

    • Method Detail

      • newCourseCatalog

        public void newCourseCatalog()
        Constructs an empty course catalog as a Sorted List.

      • loadCoursesFromFile

        public void loadCoursesFromFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        Loads course records into the catalog from the filename parameter.
        Parameters:
        fileName - file containing list of Courses
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if file not found

      • addCourseToCatalog

        public boolean addCourseToCatalog(java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.String title,
                                  java.lang.String section,
                                  int credits,
                                  java.lang.String instructorId,
                                  int enrollmentCap,
                                  java.lang.String meetingDays,
                                  int startTime,
                                  int endTime)
        Adds a Course to the catalog. Returns true if the course is added and false if the course is unable to be added because the name/section pair matches another course in the catalog.
        Parameters:
        name - Course name
        title - Course title
        section - Course section
        credits - Course credit hours
        instructorId - Course instructor
        enrollmentCap - Course enrollment capacity
        meetingDays - Course meeting days as series of chars
        startTime - Course starting time
        endTime - Course ending time
        Returns:
        true if added

      • removeCourseFromCatalog

        public boolean removeCourseFromCatalog(java.lang.String name,
                                       java.lang.String section)
        Removes the course with the given name and section from the list of courses. Returns true if the course is removed and false if the course is not in the list.
        Parameters:
        name - course name
        section - course section
        Returns:
        true if removed

      • getCourseFromCatalog

        public Course getCourseFromCatalog(java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String section)
        Returns a Course that matches the provided name and section
        Parameters:
        name - course name
        section - course section
        Returns:
        Course matching name and section

      • getCourseCatalog

        public java.lang.String[][] getCourseCatalog()
        Returns all courses in the catalog with a column for name and section.
        Returns:
        String array containing course name and section.

      • saveCourseCatalog

        public void saveCourseCatalog(java.lang.String fileName)
        Saves all courses in the catalog to a file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of file to save courses to.
